targets.expr:
max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"data-daemon-avalanche-sts-0"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-daemon-avalanche-sts-0"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-daemon-avalanche-sts-0"})
* 100)

max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-avalanche-sts-0"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-avalanche-sts-0"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-avalanche-sts-0"})
* 100)

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/(info|gas|send|metadata).*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*?)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/(info|gas|send|metadata).*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*?)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/account.*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*/account)(?:\\/.*?|\\?.*|$)(\\/.*?|$)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/account.*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*/account)(?:\\/.*?|\\?.*|$)(\\/.*?|$)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/tx.*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*/tx).*")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="avalanche", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/tx.*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*/tx).*")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))

  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-optimism-sts-0"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-optimism-sts-0"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-indexer-optimism-sts-0"})
* 100)

max without(instance,node) (
(
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-op-node-optimism-sts-0"})
  -
  topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-op-node-optimism-sts-0"})
)
/
topk(1, kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="data-op-node-optimism-sts-0"})
* 100)

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/(info|gas|send|metadata).*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*?)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/(info|gas|send|metadata).*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*?)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/account.*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*/account)(?:\\/.*?|\\?.*|$)(\\/.*?|$)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/account.*"}, "endpoint", "$1$2", "route", "(.*/account)(?:\\/.*?|\\?.*|$)(\\/.*?|$)(?:\\?.*|$)")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))

(sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/tx.*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*/tx).*")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(label_replace(unchained_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", coinstack="optimism", statusCode!="404", route=~"/api/v1/tx.*"}, "endpoint", "$1", "route", "(.*/tx).*")[$__rate_interval:])) by (endpoint))
